children.name: set

parameters.name: value `Object`
parameters.description: The new option value.If the new value is exactly the same as the new value the operationwill not trigger options change on the observer (if any).

parameters.name: field `String`
parameters.description: The name of the option to set.Must be a fully qualified name (e.g. "foo.bar") for nested options.

children.description: Sets the value of the specified option.

children.name: get

parameters.name: field `String`
parameters.description: The field name to retrieve.Must be a fully qualified name (e.g. "foo.bar") for nested options.

children.description: Gets the value of the specified option.
